name: livereactload
description: Live code editing with Browserify and React
author: Matti Lankinen <m.lankinen@iki.fi> (https://github.com/milankinen)

scripts.dist: babel src --source-maps inline --blacklist strict src/requireOverride.js --out-dir lib
scripts.test: babel-tape-runner test/**/*Test.js ; EXIT_VALUE=$? ; killall node ; exit $EXIT_VALUE
